title: Delhi News Today Live Updates: Arvind Kejriwal to remain in jail as HC stays bail till decision on ED’s plea in excise policy case
selftext: What kind of draconian laws and  judiciary do we have in india? Have we all just accepted that art 20 and 21 is nonexistent?
